ovdesc.p: This working file contains the summary of positions (real or simulate) hold in a customer security account with its valuation.
The records are created by the routine defined in the SET.RTN field of the AM.PARAMETER file (defaulted routine is SET.POSITION).

desc.p: Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
Specifies a type of position SIMULATION HEDGING SCENARIO POSITION. It depends on the clients routine defined in the SET.RTN field of the AM.PARAMETER file.
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in the SET.RTN field is executed
System generated enquiry selection field
Price of this position that is to be used for valuation purposes.
The OPTION field returned from the AM.ENTITY associated with this position.
Is set according to SET.POSITION routine. (see SET.POS.RTN field in AM.PARAMETER)
System generated field see helptext for TYPE field
Nominal value of SC position
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in the SET.RTN field is executed
Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
Contains the amount of the ESTIMATION field and the ACCRUED.INT field from the SC.POS.ASSET record.
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in the SET.RTN field is executed
Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
This field will contain the ID of the module that gave rise to this position.
For example is the position is a security position then this field will contain 'SC' and if it is a Money Market transaction then this field will contain 'MM' etc.
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in RTN field is executed
Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
Contains the SECURITY.NO from the SC.POS.ASSET record.
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in the SET.RTN field is executed
Multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file to give details of a portfolio position.
Contains the SECURITY.CURRENCY from the SC.POS.ASSET record.
No input field
Automatically updated whenever the clients routine set in the SET.RTN field is executed
